job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkeling van AI-modellen: ontwerp, ontwikkel, en implementeer geavanceerde voorspellende modellen en algoritmes.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core activities of designing, developing, and implementing AI models and algorithms, which falls under the 'Modeling' task category.

job_tasks.phrase: Je werkt aan diverse uitdagingen zoals computer vision, regressie- en classificatieproblemen, optimalisatie en natural language processing (NLP).
job_tasks.justification: This phrase lists specific types of AI modeling tasks (computer vision, regression, classification, optimization, NLP) that are central to the 'Modeling' category.

job_tasks.phrase: Experimenten en Proof-of-Concepts: Ontwikkel experimenten om de technische haalbaarheid van verschillende modellen aan te tonen en om ze onderling te vergelijken.
job_tasks.justification: Developing experiments and Proof-of-Concepts to demonstrate technical feasibility and compare models is a key part of the modeling process, fitting the 'Modeling' category.

job_tasks.phrase: Cross-functionele samenwerking: werk samen met diverse afdelingen om AI-oplossingen naadloos te integreren binnen onze bedrijfsprocessen.
job_tasks.justification: Collaborating with diverse departments to integrate AI solutions into business processes requires understanding business needs and aligning technical solutions, which aligns with 'Business Understanding'.

job_tasks.phrase: Kennisdeling en presentatie: deel je bevindingen en aanbevelingen met zowel technische teams als niet-technische stakeholders.
job_tasks.justification: Sharing findings and recommendations with both technical and non-technical stakeholders clearly falls under 'Communication & Collaboration'.

job_tasks.phrase: Blijf up-to-date met de laatste trends in data science en AI, en deel deze kennis binnen het bedrijf.
job_tasks.justification: Staying updated with the latest trends and sharing knowledge indicates a commitment to continuous learning and adaptability, fitting the 'Learning & Adaptability' skill.

soft_skills.phrase: Cross-functionele samenwerking: werk samen met diverse afdelingen om AI-oplossingen naadloos te integreren binnen onze bedrijfsprocessen.
Kennisdeling en presentatie: deel je bevindingen en aanbevelingen met zowel technische teams als niet-technische stakeholders.
Blijf up-to-date met de laatste trends in data science en AI, en deel deze kennis binnen het bedrijf.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development, implementation, and comparison of predictive models and algorithms across various domains like computer vision and NLP. While it mentions AI solutions, the core focus is on traditional machine learning tasks rather than generative AI specifics like RAG or fine-tuning LLMs.
